          ⚡️ TrackerZapper rknight.me/apps/tracker-zapper/ TrackerZapper sits in your menubar and automatically removes tracking parameters from URLs. You can turn it off if you need to keep them for some reason. It's even got an about screen (I'm coming for you @jamesthomson 👀️)
